question_text:
Question
 47
For the hottest month of the year at the proposed airport site, the monthly mean of the average daily 
temperature is 
0
39 C
 . The monthly mean of the maximum daily temperature is 
0
48 C
for the same month 
of the year. From the given information, the calculated Airport Reference Temperature (in
 
0
C
), is
(A) 
36 
(B) 39 
(C) 48 
(D) 42
